channel.title: Help with right click and selecting option

item.title: Help with right click and selecting option
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

that would work for SRL:

procedure stealing;
begin
repeat
repeat
if findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,chestcolor… blah then mmouse(x,y,3,3)
until option2(‘hest’)
mouse(x,y,3,3,false)
until clickoption(‘earch’,1)
end;

item.title: Help with right click and selecting option
item.dc:creator: @fooktard fooktard
item.description:
@fooktard wrote:

ok im making a nat theiver, ive got it 2 right click the chest but non of the comands ive used will make it right click “Search for traps”

heres the code im using…

procedure stealing; begin ClickMSColor(chestcolor,false); wait(500+RANDOM(565)); PopUp('Search for traps Chest'); end;

Can some1 pleeeease show me how i can get it 2 right click the option?

thanks.
